fixed_skill.desc: Deal Ice damage to 1 foe equal to 106.2/111.5/116.8% of Attack. 59.0/62.0/64.9% chance to inflict Freeze for 2 turns.
fixed_skill.name: Bufu

innate_skill.desc: Deal Ice damage to all foes equal to 53.1/55.8/58.4% of Attack. 29.5/31.0/32.4% chance to inflict Freeze for 2 turns.
innate_skill.name: Mabufu

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 2.9%. Decrease damage taken from Frozen foes by 20%.
passive_skill.name: Frostproof Dwarf

passive_skill.desc: Increase Attack by 2.9%. Decrease damage taken from Frozen foes by 23%.
passive_skill.name: Frostproof Dwarf I

showtime_skill.desc: Deal Ice damage to 1 foe equal to 360.0%/385.2%/410.4% of Attack.
showtime_skill.name: Highlight
